channel.title: A little help please
channel.description:
Well basicly I'm trying to run InsidiaX V8 and when i try to click on run for the source and the client it just comes up as
The system cannot find the Path Specified. Press any button to continue.
Idk what to do. I dl'd the latest Java and nothing. HEre is the source's run files
@echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
And this is the clients...
@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
Any help? And also. When i try to run the clients run it pulls up. then it dissapears really quick. Any help guys? Ik... this is a nooby question.

item.title: A little help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You need to find the right info to put in your Run.bat in you client and server. For example if you had windows 7 it’d look something like this

[code]@echo off
title InFecTionX
color 0a

:start
echo.
echo -
echo InFecTionX Starting up…
echo -
if exist “%HOMEDRIVE%\Program Files (x86)” goto x64
goto x86

:x32
title InFecTionX (x32) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x32) System
echo -
echo Client Output will be below
echo -
echo.
“%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x32)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32

:x64
title InFecTionX (x64) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System
echo -
echo Client Output will be below
echo -
echo.
“%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32
exit

:x86
title InFecTionX (x86) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System
echo -
echo Client Output will be below
echo -
echo.
“%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -cp bin -Xms512m -Xmx624m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause[/code]
you can try that.

Read full topic
